name: worklenz
description: Worklenz is a self-hosted project and task management platform built for teams. It offers boards, timelines, time tracking, and reporting, helping teams collaborate and manage workloads in a single web-based workspace.
features: Project boards: Organize tasks in Kanban-style boards with customizable columns and workflows.
Timeline view: Visualize project schedules with Gantt charts showing task dependencies and milestones.
Time tracking: Log hours spent on tasks and generate timesheets for billing or productivity analysis.
Task management: Create tasks with descriptions, assignees, due dates, priorities, and custom fields.
Team collaboration: Comment on tasks, mention team members, and share files within project context.
Workload management: View team capacity and task distribution to balance assignments effectively.
Reporting: Generate reports on project progress, time spent, and team performance metrics.
Custom workflows: Define project-specific workflows and task statuses to match your processes.
Notifications: Receive alerts for task assignments, due dates, and project updates via email or in-app.
Project templates: Create reusable project templates to standardize workflows across similar initiatives.
Resource allocation: Assign team members to projects and track their availability across multiple initiatives.
Activity logs: Audit project changes and task updates with detailed activity history.
